alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 2:23PM CDT until August 27 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 223 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Magnolia Springs, or 7 miles east of Point Clear, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Foley, Point Clear, and Magnolia Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
